title: Joe Abercrombie - Half the World (Shattered Sea #2)
description:
New York Times bestselling author Joe AbercrombieÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s thrilling new series continues in the follow-up to Half a King, which George R. R. Martin hailed as Ã¢â‚¬Å“a fast-paced tale of betrayal and revenge that grabbed me from page 1 and refused to let go.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½

Sometimes a girl is touched by Mother War.

Thorn is such a girl. Desperate to avenge her dead father, she lives to fight. But she has been named a murderer by the very man who trained her to kill.

Sometimes a woman becomes a warrior.

She finds herself caught up in the schemes of Father Yarvi, GettlandÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s deeply cunning minister. Crossing half the world to find allies against the ruthless High King, she learns harsh lessons of blood and deceit.

Sometimes a warrior becomes a weapon.

Beside her on the journey is Brand, a young warrior who hates to kill, a failure in his eyes and hers, but with one chance at redemption.

And weapons are made for one purpose.

Will Thorn forever be a pawn in the hands of the powerful, or can she carve her own path? 





Read by John Keating

Unabridged
